snippet: Speaking before British lawmakers on Tuesday, Mervyn A. King, governor of the Bank of England, said the New York Fed did not raise concerns about the rigging of interest rates.
abstract: Speaking before British lawmakers on Tuesday, Mervyn A. King, governor of the Bank of England, said the New York Fed did not raise concerns about the rigging of interest rates.

headline.main: Bank of England Chief Denies New York Fed Gave Warning on Rate-Rigging
